yo,found a fix.

@mamaz,the game updates itself if you install it in the right order (as shown in the readme),you can easily find serial keys online by typing the expansion name in google and then cd key.chances are 90% that you will find one.
Also you only need to download one crack when your done installing all the expansions.maybe look for the sims3 pets crack.
or the showtime crack.

Install all of the games, then find The Sims 3 Crack for the appropriate version to match the patch number. Or like B101 said, look for the crack for the specific game name like Pets or Showtime, but also make sure to check their version numbers as well.

Be for apply patches, install all of the games first, then run a universal patch that will install all of the games to the very latest version. Even though a new game has been released doesn't mean they won't patch it in quickly.
